author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

OutputModules can construct the PortableHostObject via the "uninitialized" constructor if no producer produced the data product. Explicit null value for the pointer communicates the absence of data to ROOT.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47697
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1495

#### PR validation:

I ran the reproducer https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47697#issuecomment-3133070084 5 times with this change, none of the crashed. Before the job crashed (nearly?) every time.
title: Always initialize `PortableHostObject::product_`
